sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { IAffilie } from '../../../app/models/affilie';
import { Document, Page, Text, View, StyleSheet, Image } from '@react-pdf/renderer'
import { observer } from 'mobx-react-lite';
import { format } from 'date-fns'
import local from 'date-fns/locale/fr'

const PdfQp: React.FC<{ affilie: IAffilie }> = ({ affilie }) => {


    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
        page: {
            fontFamily: 'Helvetica',
            fontSize: 9,
            padding: 10,
            lineHeight: 1.5,
            flexDirection: 'column',
        },
        logo: {
            width: 250,
            height: 100,
            alignItems: 'center',

        },
        row: {
            flexDirection: 'row',
            borderColor: '#E1E1E1',
            borderBottomWidth: 0.5,
            alignItems: 'center',
            height: 24,
            fontStyle: 'bold',
        },
        columnTable: {
            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '14.28%',
            textAlign: 'center',
            borderRightColor: 'black',
            borderRightWidth: 0.5,
            borderLeft: 0.5,
            paddingLeft: 8,
        },
        top: {

            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '32%',
            textAlign: 'center',
            paddingLeft: 2,
        },
        topContaint: {
            border: 0.5,
            flexDirection: 'row',
            alignItems: 'center',
            height: 75,
            fontStyle: 'bold',
            paddingRight: 30,
            marginBottom: 8,

        },
        TableHeader: {
            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '14.28%',
            textAlign: 'center',
            borderColor: 'black',
            borderRightWidth: 0.5,
            paddingLeft: 8,
            paddingTop: 8,
            borderTop: 0.5,
            borderLeft: 0.5,
            backgroundColor: '#EBEBEB',
            fontStyle: 'bold',
            textTransform: 'uppercase',
        },
        aff1: {

            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '70%',
            textAlign: 'left',
            paddingLeft: 2,
        },

        aff: {

            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '15%',
            textAlign: 'left',
            paddingLeft: 2,
        },
        affContaint: {
            flexDirection: 'row',
            alignItems: 'center',
            height: 20,
            fontStyle: 'bold',
            paddingRight: 10,
        },
        Tablefooter: {
            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '14.28%',
            textAlign: 'center',
            borderColor: 'black',
            borderRightWidth: 0.5,
            paddingLeft: 8,
            paddingTop: 8,
            borderLeft: 0.5,
            backgroundColor: '#EBEBEB',
            fontStyle: 'bold',
            textTransform: 'uppercase',
        },
        rowFooter: {
            flexDirection: 'row',
            alignItems: 'center',
            height: 24,
            fontWeight:900,
        },
        columnVide: {
            flexDirection: 'column',
            width: '28.59%',
            textAlign: 'left',
            paddingLeft: 8,
        }

    });


    const today = new Date();

    return (
        <Document>
            <Page size="A4" style={styles.page}>

                <View style={styles.topContaint}>
                    <Text style={styles.top}>Dossiers TP (SUIVIS DES AVANCES)</Text>
                    <Image style={styles.logo} src='/assets/logo_.png' />
                    <Text style={styles.top}> {format(today, 'EEEE d MMMM yyyy', { locale: local })}</Text>
                </View>

                <View style={styles.affContaint}>
                    <Text style={styles.aff} >Nom Et Prenom</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.aff1} >{affilie.nom + ' / ' + affilie.prenom}</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.affContaint}>
                    <Text style={styles.aff} >Immatriculation </Text>
                    <Text style={styles.aff1} >{affilie.cin + ' / ' + affilie.matricule}</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.affContaint}>
                    <Text style={styles.aff} >Adresse</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.aff1} >{affilie.adresse + ' / ' + affilie.ville}</Text>
                </View>

                <View style={styles.row}>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>N Dossier</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>DATE Pai</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Fr.Engage</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>R.CNOPS</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>R.MPSC</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Total.R</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Nature.Dos</Text>
                </View>

                {affilie.Qps.map(qp =>
                    <View style={styles.row}>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{qp.nDossier}</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{format(qp.datePaiementReel, 'dd/MM/yyyy', { locale: local })}</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{qp.fraisEngage}</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{qp.rembAmo} </Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{qp.rembMpsc} </Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{qp.totalRemb} </Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{qp.observation} </Text>

                    </View>
                )}

                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>1-Sous Totaux Des Avances(TP)</Text>
             
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.somFreEngage} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.somRemCnops} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.somRemMpsc} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.somRem} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>2-QP Classique</Text>

                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.Cumules} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>3-Avance MPSC</Text>
                
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.AvanceCheques} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>4-Total avance (1+2+3)</Text>
              
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.somFreEngage} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                </View>



{/*les retenues */}

                <View style={styles.affContaint}>
                    <Text style={styles.aff1} >Liste Des Retenues Effectuees</Text>
                </View>

                <View style={styles.row}>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Date.operation</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Type.Retenue</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Montant</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Code 303</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Code 304</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>Observation</Text>
                </View>

                {affilie.QpMois.map(re =>
                    <View style={styles.row}>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{format(re.date, 'dd/MM/yyyy', { locale: local })}</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{re.typePai}</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{re.qp}</Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{re.code303} </Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{re.code304} </Text>
                        <Text style={styles.columnTable}>{re.observation} </Text>
                    </View>
                )}

                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>Total Des Retenues</Text>
             
                    <Text style={styles.TableHeader}>{affilie.totalRetenues} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
 
                </View>
                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>Rest</Text>
                
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.rest} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.rowFooter}>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}>Reliquat á regle</Text>
              
                    <Text style={styles.Tablefooter}>{affilie.reliquat} Dhs</Text>
                    <Text style={styles.columnVide}></Text>
                </View>

            </Page>
        </Document>
    );


};

export default observer(PdfQp);
